scripts.build-style: node-sass --output-style compressed -o dist/ src/scss/mapzen.scss; mkdir -p dist/images; cp -r node_modules/mapzen-scarab/src/images/* dist/images/; cp -r node_modules/leaflet/dist/images/* dist/images/; cp -r node_modules/leaflet-geocoder-mapzen/dist/images/* dist/images/
scripts.build-standalone-style: node-sass --output-style compressed -o dist/ src/scss/mapzen.standalone.scss; mkdir -p dist/images; cp -r node_modules/mapzen-scarab/src/images/* dist/images/; cp -r node_modules/leaflet/dist/images/* dist/images/; cp -r node_modules/leaflet-geocoder-mapzen/dist/images/* dist/images/
scripts.build-dev-style: node-sass --output-style compressed -o dist/ src/scss/mapzen.scss -w; cp -R node_modules/mapzen-scarab/src/images dist/images; cp -r node_modules/leaflet/dist/images/* dist/images/;
scripts.build-standalone: browserify -t [browserify-shim --global] ./src/js/mapzen.js --standalone Mapzen > dist/mapzen.standalone.js; browserify -t [browserify-shim --global] -t uglifyify ./src/js/mapzen.js --standalone  Mapzen | uglifyjs -c > dist/mapzen.standalone.min.js;npm run-script build-standalone-style;
scripts.build: browserify ./src/js/mapzen.js > dist/mapzen.js; browserify -t uglifyify ./src/js/mapzen.js | uglifyjs -c > dist/mapzen.min.js; npm run-script build-style;
